DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study assess safety tolerability AZD1446 follow single multiple ascend dos orally administer solution AZD1446 healthy young elderly Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics After Single Multiple Doses AZD1446 Japanese Subject
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese subject , age ≥20 ≤50 year male young subject , ≥65 ≤80 year male postmenopausal female elderly subject . BMI 18 27 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 90 kg ( elderly female , weigh least 45 kg 90 kg ) . History Quincke oedema angiooedema , history repeat episode urticaria . History present symptom sign asthma , airway hyperreactivity obstructive lung disease .
